sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SENTICOSÆ (from ſentis, a “ briar or bramble) ;” the name of the 35th order in Linnaeus’s fragments of a natural method, conſiſting of roſe, bramble, and other plants, which reſemble them in port and external ſtructure. See Botany, page 465.
